Title: Bad Words
Plot: Warrick, Catherine and Nick try to determine the cause of a house fire that kills a teenage kill. Grissom and Sara investigate when a competitor in a word game tournament is found dead with letter tiles in his stomach.
GuestStars: T. E. Russell, Jason Kravits, Tracey Needham, Max Weinstein, Larry Poindexter, Michael Gaston, Lisa Rotondi, Christopher Shea, Christopher B. Duncan, K Callan, Roz Witt, Gena Shaw, Michael A. Miranda, Mike Bruner
